## UseFieldArrayRemove type

Remove field/fields at particular position.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UseFieldArrayRemove = (index?: number | number[]) => void;
```

## Remarks

\[API\](https://react-hook-form.com/docs/usefieldarray) â€¢ \[Demo\](https://codesandbox.io/s/calc-i231d)

## Example


```tsx
<button type="button" onClick={() => remove(0)}>Remove</button>
<button
  type="button"
  onClick={() => remove()}
>
  Remove all
</button>
```
